snippet.title: Mircea - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Meet the adorable characters in the creepy world of Mircea in this trailer for the upcoming short spooky adventure game. Explore a subway infested by mysterious, bug-like beings. Investigate and understand the monsters to capture them... before they capture you. Mircea will be available on PC.

#Mircea #Horror #Gaming
